channel.title: Delta - Dialouge

item.title: Delta - Dialouge
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

Ok, so I caved in and am starting to code some delta. Bit different from Czar to say the least.

Anyway, dialouge is way different in delta, so how do I get it to work?

Here’s what I have:

case 14: talk("You must be here for the tutorial!", 650); sendQuest("@yel@Elf beginnings", 7332); q1 = 1; toX = 3103; toY = 3103; break;

Now, I’m trying to get it so my NPC for the quest says this, I don’t see any Wannetalk, so I have no idea what to connect this to.

Also, I found this in clickingMost class.

if(c.NpcDialogue == 12){ c.closeAll(); c.NpcDialogue = 13; c.NpcDialogueSend = false; }

And there’s a bunch more like that below it. I’m guessing it has something to do like Wannetalk, but I don’t know how to make my case 14 talk connect with this.

Read full topic
